title: Starship destroyed in test stand explosion
summary:
A SpaceX Starship upper stage being prepared for the company’s next flight exploded June 19 during preparations for a static-fire test.
The post Starship destroyed in test stand explosion appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: First MetOp-SG and Sentinel-5 arrive at launch site
summary: Europe will soon be taking another leap forward in its weather forecasting capacity as the first MetOp Second Generation, MetOp-SG-A1, satellite arrives safely at Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana, marking a pivotal moment on the road to launch.

title: “The models were right”: astronomers find ‘missing’ matter
summary: Astronomers have discovered a huge filament of hot gas bridging four galaxy clusters. At 10 times as massive as our galaxy, the thread could contain some of the Universe’s ‘missing’ matter, addressing a decades-long mystery.

title: Next Starship explodes on test stand
summary: SpaceX's next Starship vehicle, Ship 36, was destroyed in a catastrophic explosion shortly after 11 p.m. CT (0400 UTC) Wednesday as it was being readied for a static fire test at the company's Massey facility, near Starbase, Texas.

title: Firefly announces commercial lunar imagery service
summary:
Firefly Aerospace says it plans to offer a commercial lunar imaging service for use by governments and companies, one that could supplement or replace an existing, but aging, NASA orbiter.

title: Curiosity Blog, Sols 4573-4574: Welcome to the Uyuni Quad
summary: Written by Lauren Edgar, Planetary Geologist at USGS Astrogeology Science Center Earth planning date: Monday, June 16, 2025 Over the weekend Curiosity successfully wrapped up activities at the “Altadena” drill site and got back on the road. title: Regulators clear Starlink-enabled texting trial in war-torn Ukraine
summary:
Regulators have approved Ukrainian telco Kyivstar’s plans to start testing space-enabled texting services this summer using SpaceX’s Starlink constellation, targeting areas crippled by Russian strikes and other terrestrial coverage gaps.
The post Regulators clear Starlink-enabled texting trial in war-torn Ukraine appeared first on SpaceNews.
